According to traditional Chinese medicine doctrines, pangolin scales are used for four broad purposes, including boosting lactation, treating furuncles and sores, rheumatoid arthritis, and for detoxification.

However, with the pangolin population on the brink of extinction, its continued consumption is a recipe for disaster. Here are alternative recipes that perform the same function as pangolin scales, in accordance with TCM doctrines.
